data.text:
The government still recommend we use mitigations but it's up to us
#COVIDIDIOTS just take that as they don't need to bother, some never did,
just one in a store could infect anyone who enters for the next 3 days

Good job it's mild & can't mutate or cause that sequela thingy

7)

Testing can be reduced providing case & death data reflects that & sensible measures should still be in place allowing people to work & live lives but not blind fold to the risks with a gov. faking it for the far right & Â£ & making it clear if it's excess deaths are low

6)

After Spanish Flu, millions were left with sequela, one suspect was Encephalitis lethargica lasting into the 30s & chronicled in the movie Awakenings, most died well before that, with more covid brain damage reports it's not just deaths early on, IT'S LONG TERM SEQUELA

5)

Allowing Covid to run free (instead of perhaps eradicating it while it's down?) we leave the door wide open for yet more mutations & it just takes one that's more infectious & deadly plus what is the cost of prolonging covid indefinitely & what is the real cost of #LongCovid

4)

When Tories ran round claiming the UK had the best growth in the G7 (who?) Apart from it was FAKE
They also didn't once mention the cost of the premature fake FREEDUMB day was another 20,000 British dead & another 1m+ #LongCovid sufferers

NOT ONCE

3)

The UK people should be given ACCURATE DATA so you can make SENSIBLE DECISIONS. These are decisions that ultimately effect your LIFE or long term HEALTH, not to be conned into another fake norm oblivious that the 1st caused ANOTHER 20,000 DEATHS & another million #LongCovid

2) https://t.co/ycmhyAu5My

Deaths by Covid are claimed to be just over 700 a week now within 28 days of a +ve test. But testing's down over 70% so cases & deaths 28 day data is being faked LOWER.
Excess deaths brought down low by mitigations are being used as a reason to FORCE A FAKE NORMAL, NOT COVID
